update() - Method in class com.rectgdx.RectSprite
Called every frame, runs Component.update() for all components
Will only print stacktrace if DebugManager.printUpdateStackTrace is true
Must run RectSprite.initial() before RectSprite.update()
update() - Static method in class com.rectgdx.SetupManager
Calls important update Calls TimeManager.updateTime(), SpriteManager.updateAll(), RenderManager.draw(), and SpriteManager.refreshObjectPooling()
